author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1583050 from trunk to branch-2.4 to fix MAPREDUCE-5813. Fix YarnChild to explicitly load job.xml from the local-filesystem, rather than rely on the classpath. Contributed by Gera Shegalov.
